name: Golden Hour (Mostel)
description:
Golden Hour is a calming interactive experience designed for adventurers who need peace of mind for a moment and regain energy along the way to new discoveries.

Dear adventurer, it's time to slow down and relax.

________________________________________________________________

Used free assets:

  • Music by SoundGalleryBy - Calm soft emotional ambient.
  • SFX from freesound.org
  • Fonts: "Type Machine" by Levi Szekeres and "Mauve Smile" by Khurasan.
  • Furniture models and boat from Cgtrader.com
  • Textures from Texturecan.com
  • Unity asset store: Living birds, AllSkyFree.
